title: CESIUM_tile_edges glTF Mesh Primitive extension
description: `CESIUM_tile_edges` extension for a primitive in a glTF model.

left.description: The index of the accessor containing indices that make up the left edge.

bottom.description: The index of the accessor containing indices that make up the bottom edge.

right.description: The index of the accessor containing indices that make up the right edge.

top.description: The index of the accessor containing indices that make up the top edge.
